LanguageData.ActivitySuppressionRate.label: activity suppression speed
LanguageData.ActivitySuppressionRate.description: The speed at which this person can suppress unnatural entities. A higher speed means they take less time to suppress each entity.
LanguageData.EntityStudyRate.label: entity study rate
LanguageData.EntityStudyRate.description: The rate at which this person generates knowledge from studying unnatural entities.
LanguageData.StudyEfficiency.label: study efficiency
LanguageData.StudyEfficiency.description: A multiplier on how much knowledge a person gets when studying unnatural entities.
